thread.title: James Driver

author: James Driver
title: James Driver
text: My experience was very satisfactory but I am disappointed that all providers are not required to Quote: prices on the same basis. I can dig through the Fact Sheet and Terms of Service buy very few consumers understand the process. Some Quote: prices with "wire charges" includes some not. Some Quote: on 2000 KWh others on 1000 KWh. It can be very confusing and actually misleading.
